title: Young Flem Extermination
description: Eliminate the Young Flems that are causing trouble near the HQ.

title: Wing Threat
description: Wing creatures are swarming the area. Eliminate them to protect the settlement.

title: Wing Membrane Collection
description: The research team needs Wing membranes for their experiments.

title: Flem Infestation
description: Flem creatures are multiplying rapidly. Thin their numbers.

title: Flem Core Research
description: Scientists need Flem cores to study their unique biology.

title: Stinkbug Extermination
description: The foul Stinkbugs are contaminating the area. Destroy them.

title: Stinkbug Shell Collection
description: Collect Stinkbug shells for armor research purposes.

title: Flem Guard Patrol
description: Flem Guards are becoming aggressive. Show them who's in charge.

title: Badge Procurement
description: Retrieve Flem Guard badges as proof of your victories.

title: Demolis Assault
description: Demolis creatures threaten our operations. Eliminate the threat.

title: Demolis Fragment Study
description: Gather Demolis fragments for crystalline research.

title: Heavy Wing Hunt
description: Heavy Wings pose a significant threat. Take them down.

title: Heavy Wing Feather Quest
description: Collect Heavy Wing feathers for crafting advanced equipment.

title: Splinter Brat Suppression
description: Splinter Brats are causing havoc. Suppress their numbers.

title: Splinter Shard Gathering
description: Gather sharp Splinter shards for weapon enhancement.

title: Lunker Elimination
description: Lunkers are terrorizing travelers. End their reign of terror.

title: Lunker Tooth Collection
description: Collect Lunker teeth for crafting powerful weapons.

title: Warbeast Challenge
description: Prove your strength by defeating the formidable Warbeasts.

title: Warbeast Claw Trophy
description: Bring back Warbeast claws as proof of your prowess.
